text: The Zhongzhou Park () is a park in Lanxi, Zhejiang. It is located on an island in the Lanjiang River. == Features == === Access === This park has floating bridges on both sides of the island. One has a swinging part to allow boats to pass the bridge. === Statue === There is a statue of Lanhua, a symbol of the city of Lanxi. == References == Category:Parks in Zhejiang Category:Jinhua
title: Zhongzhou Park
